name: Vikare Battle
subtitle: Everai x Argent x Starknet
description: Set during the iconic Battle of Vikare, the game invites players to engage in a competitive, idle-based gameplay within the Telegram ecosystem. This strategic choice brings the lore to life while utilizing Telegram's interaction and sharing capabilities.
